title: Lag

replies.body:
now e have normal ping 75 ms
Sometimes i get 5000 ms i dont uderstand..

That ping is pretty high, and it could be caused by an unstable local connection or even how your ISP is routing to us.  To start off, I recommend sticking to custom games for now to troubleshoot and run through the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  Let me know how that works out for you!
